department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating. Closing Date: December 22, 2023
description: Expansion of the current existing office seating globally across the entire Assistance university operating within the National Capital. The office chair will enable mobility and flexibility in working,.
duration_in_months: Historical data indicates the office seating lasts approximately 2 years. Therefore, we have calculated the life of the existing chair as 2 years. This would force the buyer to procure a replacement every 2 years which results in 4 procurements in a 4-year cycle,
full_summary:
### Contract Notice
 EP916-241327: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWSGS) Acquisition Notice

#### Tender Notice Summary
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified bidders to participate in a competitive tendering process for the purchase and delivery of office seating to the National Capital Region.

#### Key Information
| Key Item | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4350260455-4350425125 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4350260455 |
| **Publication Date** | December 12, 2023 |
| **Closing Date** | December 22, 2023, 14:00:00 HNE |
| **End Date** | June 30, 2024 |
| **Category** | Procurement Category: Goods (GD) |

#### Description of Goods and Services Required
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWSGS) is seeking a contractor to provide office seating solutions to the National Capital Region. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering and installing the office seating by March 31, 2024.

#### Important Notes
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the closing date and time.
* Bids submitted after 14:00 HNE on December 22, 2023, will be considered non-responsive.
* The Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded through the bidder's SAP Ariba account.

#### Contact Information and Additional Resources
| Key Item | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Contact Information** | Michelle Wong, SPAC/PSPC (elle-la / she-her), <michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca> |
| **Notice URL** | https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18259535 |

Admittedly, there are a lot of details; however, they had to be kept to ensure relevant and complete information. I tried to balance detail retention with brevity, making the text concise and easy to understand. Please let me know if you need me to adjust anything further.  I can certainly remove any unrelated text if you prefer.
